original_text: Observe and hear all these words which I command thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee for ever, when thou doest that which is good and right in the sight of the Lord thy God.
korean_text: 내가 네게 명령하는 이 모든 말을 너는 듣고 지키라 네 하나님 여호와의 목전에 선과 의를 행하면 너와 네 후손에게 영구히 복이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Observe and hear all these words
that it may go well with thee
and with thy children after thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 후손 자녀들과도 잘되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: when thou doest that which is good
and right in the sight of the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와 보시기에 정직한 것을 행할 때
